data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on the armored spiders of the families Pacullidae and Tetrablemmidae (Arachnida, Araneae) from Singapore

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Yucheng, Koh, Joseph K. H., Koponen, Seppo, Li, Shuqiang (2017): Taxonomic notes on the armored spiders of the families Pacullidae and Tetrablemmidae (Arachnida, Araneae) from Singapore. ZooKeys 661: 15-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.661.10677, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.661.10677
